name: Flippy Bot - Mobile
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 51 Game Jam 2022! The theme for this jam was: "Every 10  seconds"

Make your way through this cartoony "flappy bird-like" endless runner! :) 

But beware: when gravitation changes, you have to act quick to keep your run going! Improvise, adapt and overcome - to raise your highscore bit by bit ;)

Conrols are simple: press the screen to accelerate and juggle between obstacles!

Credits

Marc Wandrei: Game Programming / Game Design

Justin "Kabura" Neumann: Game Art / Game Design

Fesliyan Studios: Main Theme - "Retro Funk"
